offences.offenceWording: On 02/07/2015 At Threadneedle Street EC2 Being a passenger on a Public service Vehicle operated on behalf of London Bus Services Limited being used for the carriage of passengers at separate fares where the vehicle was being operated by a Driver without a Conductor did not as directed by the Driver an Inspector or a Notice displayed on the vehicle pay the fare for the journey in accordance with the direction
offences.offenceWordingWelsh: Welsh wording: On 02/07/2015 At Threadneedle Street EC2 Being a passenger on a Public service Vehicle operated on behalf of London Bus Services Limited being used for the carriage of passengers at separate fares where the vehicle was being operated by a Driver without a Conductor did not as directed by the Driver an Inspector or a Notice displayed on the vehicle pay the fare for the journey in accordance with the direction
offences.witnessStatement: It is a fact - you are a crook
